thread.title: BRIEF-Sincerity Applied Materials Holdings Corp Files for Offering Of Up To 12.4 mln Shares Of Co's Common Stock By Selling Stockholders

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sincerity Applied Materials Holdings Corp Files for Offering Of Up To 12.4 mln Shares Of Co's Common Stock By Selling Stockholders
text: Market News   in 10 minutes BRIEF-Sincerity Applied Materials Holdings Corp Files for Offering Of Up To 12.4 mln Shares Of Co's Common Stock By Selling Stockholders Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 21 (Reuters) - Sincerity Applied Materials Holdings Corp: * SINCERITY APPLIED MATERIALS HOLDINGS CORP FILES PROSPECTUS RELATES TO OFFERING OF UP TO 12.4 MILLION SHARES OF CO'S COMMON STOCK BY SELLING STOCKHOLDERS - SEC FILING Source text - ( bit.ly/2CavLC5 ) Further company coverage:
